text: The Everliving haunted the Forests of Shadows for generations, under iron rule by the cunning, sly and deadly Zacharias the Everliving. This all ended brutally as his own kin, Melchior betrayed him. The Everliving follow Zacharias still however, as he plots his ultimate revenge.
This has to be the worst comeback I have ever seen..

Albrecht Nictus was the first grand master of the order of Drakenhof Templars, and cousin to Isabella von Carstein. He was subjugated and enslaved by Zacharias as a provocation to the Von Carnsteins, serving senselessly in his personal retinue ever since.

Passed on from Margrave to Margrave, Helmgart's Brand is the token worn by the Lord-Warden of the Grey Mountains. Forged by the Dwarfs of Karak Zorn it is enchanted with magical essence, hence why it's hilt always remains warm and pleasant to handle - regardless of the terrain the sword finds itself in. Making it easy for any wielder to fight regardless of the climate.
